query:
UPDATE belt_progress bp
JOIN students s ON bp.studentId = s.id
SET bp.currentBelt = COALESCE(s.beltRank, 'White'),
    bp.nextBelt = CASE 
      WHEN s.beltRank = 'White' OR s.beltRank = 'White Belt' THEN 'Yellow'
      WHEN s.beltRank = 'Yellow' OR s.beltRank = 'Yellow Belt' THEN 'Orange'
      WHEN s.beltRank = 'Orange' OR s.beltRank = 'Orange Belt' THEN 'Green'
      WHEN s.beltRank = 'Green' OR s.beltRank = 'Green Belt' THEN 'Brown'
      WHEN s.beltRank = 'Brown' OR s.beltRank = 'Brown Belt' THEN 'Blue'
      WHEN s.beltRank = 'Blue' OR s.beltRank = 'Blue Belt' THEN 'Purple'
      WHEN s.beltRank = 'Purple' OR s.beltRank = 'Purple Belt' THEN 'Red'
      WHEN s.beltRank = 'Red' OR s.beltRank = 'Red Belt' THEN 'Black'
      WHEN s.beltRank = 'Black' OR s.beltRank = 'Black Belt' THEN 'Black'
      ELSE 'Yellow'
    END;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user aYsLc9eZnrL9DEu.43c395b54aa0 --database 2Awpr243D2Jitpj6Cn66Rx --execute UPDATE belt_progress bp
JOIN students s ON bp.studentId = s.id
SET bp.currentBelt = COALESCE(s.beltRank, 'White'),
    bp.nextBelt = CASE 
      WHEN s.beltRank = 'White' OR s.beltRank = 'White Belt' THEN 'Yellow'
      WHEN s.beltRank = 'Yellow' OR s.beltRank = 'Yellow Belt' THEN 'Orange'
      WHEN s.beltRank = 'Orange' OR s.beltRank = 'Orange Belt' THEN 'Green'
      WHEN s.beltRank = 'Green' OR s.beltRank = 'Green Belt' THEN 'Brown'
      WHEN s.beltRank = 'Brown' OR s.beltRank = 'Brown Belt' THEN 'Blue'
      WHEN s.beltRank = 'Blue' OR s.beltRank = 'Blue Belt' THEN 'Purple'
      WHEN s.beltRank = 'Purple' OR s.beltRank = 'Purple Belt' THEN 'Red'
      WHEN s.beltRank = 'Red' OR s.beltRank = 'Red Belt' THEN 'Black'
      WHEN s.beltRank = 'Black' OR s.beltRank = 'Black Belt' THEN 'Black'
      ELSE 'Yellow'
    END;
